name: Greenhouse Communications
goal: The consultancy provides counsel & advice on global agri-food regulatory and policy issues to clients in the U.S. and EU agri-food sectors.
interests: Agriculture, Climate Action, Consumers, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
customers: US Soybean Export Council,International Soy Growers Alliance,US Sustainability Alliance
